title: CV — Tomas Valiukas
text: TOMAS VALIUKAS Proﬁle 20+ years of experience leading international business ventures. Proven ability to establish, grow, and scale companies across IT, payments, telecom, tourism, advertising, and events sectors. Experience Co-founder, InBlock.ai. LT — Oct 2024 - Sep 2025 Developed an AI agent-based platform that aggregates and analyzes information on crypto assets, helping users make informed investment decisions and identify potential scams. Business development, ASHBURN Int. LT, KG, UZ — Jul 2023 - Sep 2024 Pursued business development opportunities across the payment industry, establishing strategic partnerships with key industry players, such as banks, acquirers, processing centers, alternative payment organizations, etc. Independently secured a $6M sales lead, the largest in the company's history. Owner/director, Saigon Star Travel Ltd. VN — Jul 2016 - Mar 2023 Started a tourism and event company, the ﬁrst to acquire commercial balloon ﬂight license in Vietnam. Pivoted the company's focus towards advertising and event services for the local market during COVID-19. Sold the company after achieving an annual turnover of EUR 600k+ with a 40% net proﬁt margin. Business development, Mediafon, JSC MM — Jul 2015 - Jul 2016 Negotiated the deployment of mobile money interoperability platform with Myanmar Payment Union and Central Bank. Conducted feasibility study for data center construction (60 to 180 racks) in Yangon. Operations were suspended in anticipation of the impending military coup. Co-Founder, WiderﬁLT, UK, US — Jun 2013 - Jun 2023 Mobile data at local prices globally. Led startup from inception to successful launch on Bitė network. Attracted EUR 1.2M investment from Mediafon, Practica Capital, Nextury Ventures. Achieved revenue generation within a year. Business development, Mediafon, JSC AZ, NG, VN — Jan 2011 - Jan 2013 Played an instrumental role in winning the Number Portability tender in Azerbaijan. Conducted mobile money feasibility study in Vietnam. Regional Partner, Mediafon, JSC SE Asia — Apr 2008 - Jan 2011 Established and led companies in Thailand and Vietnam, managing a team of over 50 people. Launched TV shows and websites with telco VAS elements as the main monetization channel. Generated over USD 10M in revenue within two years with a net proﬁt margin of 10%. Other experience FR, LT, RU, UA — Jan 2000 - Dec 2010 Owned a sawmill and wood pellet, briquette production facility (Ukraine), served as the Director of the Lithuanian Business Club in Kaliningrad, interned at OECD (France), served as a Lithuanian diplomat.
